docs.title: User Onboarding
docs.text:
• This is the sign-up page for users and influencers to start off with influencer-talk
  • Users can sign up using their phone number/E-mail ID, entering their Full Name and password
  • They can also choose to authenticate using their Google Account
  • Incase, they already have an account they can also Login into their account using their Phone Number/E-mail ID or Google Account

docs.title: Home Page
docs.text:
• Home page consists of a list of available influencers that users can connect with
  • Users can message with their favourite influencer by clicking on the Chat Button
  • View profile button is ued view the influencer's profile

docs.title: Chats Page
docs.text: • The chats page contains all the recent conversations of the user with the influencers

docs.title: Profile Details Page
docs.text:
• The profile page contains the profile information of the user information
  • The user can click on the edit icon to make changes to any of their perosnal information or change their profile picture

docs.title: Credits
docs.text:
• Credits are our app's currency.
  • Everything in the app is paid through credits.

docs.title: Obtaining Credits
docs.text:
• Click on the Credits or coin like icon at the top of the home screen.
  • Tapping on this icon will take the user to the credits shop.
  • Clicking on any of the credit option will direct users to the payment page.
  • Here, users can pay using the payment method of their choice.

docs.title: Transaction History
docs.text: • Tapping on this icon will take the user to the transaction history made by the user.

docs.title: Settings Menu
docs.text: • Clicking on the side menu button on the home page will navigate the user to the Setings Menu.

docs.title: Edit Details
docs.text: • User can change their Name, Gender and Age

docs.title: Settings
docs.text: • User can change App notification and Update preferences

docs.title: Account Settings
docs.text:
• Contains user options for the account like changing email address, phone number and updating password
  • The contact us option contains the helps user contact support
  • Using the Register as an influencer button, the user can register themselves as an influencer on the app
  • The user can also delete their account using the Delete Your Account option

docs.title: Notification Settings
docs.text: • User can change the settings of alerts and notifcations of the app using this menu

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text: • User can read on the app usage privacy policy and terms and conditions for using the app

docs.title: App Info
docs.text: • Contains information about the application

docs.title: Support
docs.text:
• Users can view their existing tickets using the support button
  • They can also raise a new ticket, by filling out a form and adding any reference images

docs.title: Log Out
docs.text: • Users can log out of the application using this button

docs.title: Login as a User
docs.text:
• To register as an Influencer, first login as a normal user.
  • Navigate to home page and click on the 3 dot menu near the coin icon at the top.
  • Click on my account .
  • Click on Register as an Influencer.

docs.title: Phone number verification
docs.text:
• click on Update now
  • Enter your phone number and tap Continue.
  • wait for otp verification.
  • Enter the otp and click verify.
  • Exit to the previous screen and click Register as an Influencer again.

docs.title: Entering relevant details.
docs.text: • Enter the required details.

docs.title: Identity verification and supporting documents.
docs.text:
• Here , users can upload their identity documents to support their verification process.
  • Our onboarding representatives will get in touch with to user to assist in this process.

docs.title: Influencer Profile
docs.text:
• Navigate to the home page and tap view profile.
  • Click on Chat to initiate a conversation with the influencer.

docs.title: Video call and Voice call requests
docs.text:
• To initiate a voice/video call request click on the call icon near the top.
  • This will initiate a popup near the bottom.
  • Click on a desired option.
  • Select duration.
  • This will trigger a request to the influencer.
  • After the request is approved, click on the call icon again and initiate a video call.
  • A Notification is displayed while the call on ongoing.

docs.title: Call charges
docs.text:
• Charges for call are based on duration. xyz credits/ min.
  • After a call total charges for that session are displayed in the chat history.
  • The same can be observed via payment history page.

docs.title: Rating Influencers
docs.text: • Users can rate influencers by tapping the icon next to call on top of chats page.

docs.title: Notifications and alerts
docs.text:
• Chat notification.
  • Call request notification.
  • Incoming call notification.
  • Missed call notification.
  • A history of notifications can be viewed on the notification page.
  • To access, tap the bell icon on the home page.

docs.title: Profile
docs.text:
• Navigate to the home page and tap view profile.
  • An influencer can change their profile details, update their social handles, and their connection charges
  • They can also change their profile photo and edit or add their featured video

docs.title: Featured Videos
docs.text:
• Influencers can edit featured videos from their profile page by clicking on the edit icon on the top right
  • They can add by clicking on the plus icon at the botton right and remove the featured videos on their profile

docs.title: Influencer Collabs
docs.text:
• Click on Chat to initiate a conversation with the influencer.
  • Clicking on Collabs can intiate a collab request with another influencer

docs.title: Requests page
docs.text: • Influencers can view and respond to all requests at one page.

docs.title: Earnings
docs.text:
• Influencers can view their earnings and related stats.
  • They can adjust the days as update bank details as well.
